properties.title: Skill Area Flims Bergbahnen
properties.abstract: The skill area is located at the mountain cableways in Flims Dorf. It is the perfect place for you to hone and learn skills.
properties.description:
If you want to improve your skills on the bike, the Skills Area is just the thing. The skill area consists of a trail with a root and stone area, banked and hairpin bends, and two small jumps of varying heights. After warming up at the skill area, take the two chairlifts to the Runca Trail â€“ the perfect place to put everything you practiced to the test.

Length: 150m / surface: gravel.
properties.name: Flims Laax Falera
